column4: I hibernated my computer, powered it on and off repeatedly accidentally, and now when I start iot grub tells me it "error 21: Selected disk does not exist". Whats wrong and how do I fix i? please?
difficult to say without looking at it
what do you need to know? wghat COULD be the problem?
bad hard disk, invalid menu.lst, poofed grub, bad libc, etc.
